Package: org.ajoberstar.grgit.operation

[Groovy] Class TagAddOp

    • org.ajoberstar.grgit.operation.TagAddOp
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      java.util.concurrent.Callable

      class TagAddOp
extends java.lang.Object

      Adds a tag to the repository. Returns the newly created Tag.

      Add an annotated tag.

       grgit.tag.add(name: 'new-tag')
 grgit.tag.add(name: 'new-tag', message: 'Some message')
 grgit.tag.add(name: 'new-tag', annotate: true)

      Add an unannotated tag.

       grgit.tag.add(name: 'new-tag', annotate: false)

      Add a tag starting at a specific commit.

       grgit.tag.add(name: 'new-tag', pointsTo: 'other-branch')

      Overwrite an existing tag.

       grgit.tag.add(name: 'existing-tag', force: true)
      See git-tag Manual Page.
      See Also:
      git-tag Manual Page
      Since:
      0.2.0

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          boolean  annotate
          true (the default) if an annotated tag should be created, false otherwise.
          boolean  force
          true to overwrite an existing tag, false (the default) otherwise
          java.lang.String  message
          The message to put on the tag.
          java.lang.String  name
          The name of the tag to create.
          java.lang.Object  pointsTo
          The commit the tag should point to.
          Person  tagger
          The person who created the tag.
